headline: NESLAB HEATING BATH 12.25 LITER
keywords: temperature Chillers Recirculating Chillers cooler bath

specstable:
Manufacturer Neslab
Model EX-211-MP
Minimum Temperature -10 ºC (14 ºF, 263.00 ºK)
Maximum Temperature 150 ºC (302 ºF, 423 ºK)
Cooling Capacity 450 W (1,535 BTU/hr)
Heating Capacity 800 BTU/hr (0.23 kW, 0.31 HP)
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 0.010 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Overtemperature Protection YES
Interface RS 232
Controller Manufacturer/Model Microprocessor
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Bath/Tank Dimensions
Length 9.2500 in (23.50 cm, 235.0 mm)
Width 10.0000 in (25.40 cm, 254.0 mm)
Depth 6.0000 in (15.24 cm, 152.4 mm)
Pump type/Model Z
Max Flow 4 GPM (15.20 l/m)
Inlet Connection 1/4-mpt
Outlet Connection 1/4-mpt
Capacity/Liquid 12.25 L (3.24 gal)
Accessories FTC-350A Flow Through Refrigerated Cooler
14.5-H, 8.75-W, 13.00-D
115-volts 5-amps 60-hz
30-lbs
Other Information Multistep programming 8-temperature programs, each one having up to 15 program steps
High / Low Temperature Safety
Direct RS-232
Display Deg. F or C
Remote Sensing 9-pin Sensor port

The controller detaches from the bath for remote operation with 10-ft cord

Power Requirements 115 V 9.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
